migrations.description: Split global configuration files into individual project.json files. This migration has been added automatically to the beginning of your migration set to retroactively make them work with the new version of Nx.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Set project names in project.json files
migrations.name: 15.1.0-set-project-names

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 15.8.2-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Remove @nrwl/cli.
migrations.name: 16.0.0-remove-nrwl-cli

migrations.description: Replace `dependsOn.projects` and `inputs` definitions with new configuration format.
migrations.name: 16.0.0-tokens-for-depends-on

migrations.description: Replace @nrwl/nx-cloud with nx-cloud
migrations.name: 16.0.0-update-nx-cloud-runner

migrations.description: Replace @nx/eslint-plugin with @nx/eslint-plugin
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v11. This migration will only update if the workspace is already on v10. https://www.cypress.io/blog/2022/11/04/upcoming-changes-to-component-testing/
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-11

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v12. Cypress 12 contains a handful of breaking changes that might causes tests to start failing that nx cannot directly fix. Read more Cypress 12 changes: https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-12-0.This migration will only run if you are already using Cypress v11.
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-12

migrations.description: Replace @nx/cypress with @nx/cypress
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Update `@nx/web/babel` preset to `@nrwl/js/babel` for projects that have a .babelrc file.
migrations.name: update-babel-preset

migrations.description: Add @nrwl/linter, @nx/cypress, @nx/jest, @nrwl/rollup if they are used
migrations.name: add-dropped-dependencies

migrations.description: Replace @nx/web with @nx/web
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Replace @nx/web executors with @nx/webpack and @nx/rollup
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-update-executors

migrations.description: Update jest configs to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-configs-jest-29

migrations.description: Update jest test files to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-tests-jest-29

migrations.description: Replace @nx/jest with @nx/jest
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Update projects using @nx/web:rollup to @nrwl/rollup:rollup for build.
migrations.name: update-rollup-executor

migrations.description: Install new dependencies for React projects using Webpack or Rollup.
migrations.name: install-webpack-rollup-dependencies

migrations.description: Creates or updates webpack.config.js file with the new options for webpack.
migrations.name: react-webpack-config-setup

migrations.description: Replace @nx/react with @nx/react
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages
